Description: Painted pottery shabti of Hat, Fan Bearer of Min and Revered Before Anubis with a black lappet-wig, a brown modelled face with white eyes and a red mouth, a red and yellow collar and crossed arms in relief holding red hoes and the string of the yellow seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with the Nbʿ formula in a column of black painted Hieroglyphs upon a yellow ground; the remaining body is white.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
